Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: amblank
Reviews.Content: I am an apartment manager, and I use this camera all the time to take photos of damages after people move out.  The auto-focus works great in various lighting conditions, and I have never had a photo come out blurry.  The batteries seem to die fast, so I always carry an extra set.I am purchasing another one of these for my 7 year old, because it is inexpensive for the quality of the photos.  The shutter speed is quick enough for his always-moving hands, and the buttons are simple enough for him to easily operate.  This is exactly what I have been looking for.

Reviews.Title: Great while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Mictown78
Reviews.Content: The camera worked great, for the first 7 weeks I owned it. I purchased this camera for the Lomo feature. The camera took decent pictures. The reason I give the item 2 stars is that on the 53rd day I owned the product, it would not turn on. I thought it might have been a dead battery, so I plugged it into the charger, but the USB/Power LED did not light up. Despite reseating the battery and trying different USB cables, I could not get the camera to operate again.

Reviews.Title: this is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Gunner45
Reviews.Content: this camera is everything i would want in a camera!!!!!!!! i love it i bought it last night got an sd card so easy to use you can edit your pics you can make REAL movies you can stop in the middle and start again! i would recommend this to ANYONE !

Reviews.Title: ... while on vacation so I knew it was a good
Reviews.Author: sharon k. peterson
Reviews.Content: I had this camera before and it was lost while on vacation so I knew it was a good camera

Reviews.Title: Best camera I've ever owned
Reviews.Author: Carlene
Reviews.Content: This camera is so easy to use and takes wonderful pictures.  Everything is a finger touch away and all the settings helps you to take the best pictures ever.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: robert baker
Reviews.Content: Good quality camera at a good price. I use my camera almost everyday for work and the last one of this model that I had was a very reliable long loved camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Norma Contreras
Reviews.Content: I really love the quality of this camera it takes great pictures. I am hoping to buy another one since my old one broke. I am glad I could find it here because where I bought it it's not for sale anymore.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: SpaceShipRuthie
Reviews.Content: love the touch screenDaytime pictures are great, night shots can be a bit grainy if ISO is set a little high, but other than that, it is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Sanyo Camera
Reviews.Author: James J. Trivitayakhun
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for audit work.  It is the only one I have found that imprints date and time on the picture.  The zoom is very good and the flash very bright, sometime too bright - but good for even 10 feet away.  The camera also does HD movies.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: i'm not a camera guru just looking to record my families memories. this is really nice simple. just need to play around with the camera for a little bit to learn the know hows. but my came with a manual but you know how guys are...we don't need directions...lol it is simple and fun to use. the only flaw i found recently during a wedding take was when zooming in or out the sound will cut out momentarily.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: alwayson
Reviews.Content: great camera! easy to use and takes great pics!I do real estate inspections so It is great for this price!Mark the puter geek

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Until it wouldnt charge
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from Walmart 6 days ago. I was Extremely happy with the quality of photos, and how well it took pictures of my very active kids. Today after only 6 days of use, not being dropped or anything abusive it stopped charging and wont come on. I have tried charging from my computer, from the wall, my car, a different cord.. Nothing. Makes me very sad too because now I wont have a camera for my son's Birthday...

ProductInfo.Features:
14 megapixel resolution
Sanyo 5x zoom lens
3.0" touch panel LCD display
720P Movie recording
Digital Anti-Shake Reduce image blur
ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo Digital Camera w/ 5x Optical Zoom, 14 MegaPixel , 3" LCD Display , Movie Rocording - Blue Color
